Magic.Name: ZT_JZM_X
Magic.Desc: Make Zhenxian gain experience.

Magic.Name: ZT_JZM_XG
Magic.Desc: Make true fairy return to normal state.

Magic.Name: YCSS
Magic.Desc: People who have died or died can be resurrected.
Magic.TargetDesc: 请选择一名已死亡的角色。

Magic.Name: SQDD
Magic.Desc: Three thousand avenues, Tao Dao conception, Tao Dao Xianxian Road. 20 times faster practice

Magic.Name: LXDD
Magic.Desc: Know the dragon with the gods and enter the void.

Magic.Name: ZT_DDZJ
Magic.Desc: According to the Void Sutra, the magical method of combining with the void, the consciousness and the migration of space, can increase the speed of practice by 12 times.

Magic.Name: KHBT
Magic.Desc: Go to the designated place to absorb the aura in the environment (50x speed)

Magic.Name: LHXK
Magic.Desc: Unleash the living creatures, consume the target's life, and replenish their aura.

Magic.Name: ZT_KJHJ
Magic.Desc: Use the power of space to refine a corpse, refine its flesh and blood, and replenish your aura.

Magic.Name: DH
Magic.Desc: Release the aura from the buildings, plants, and minerals in the scene. The more target auras, the higher the upper limit of your own aura, and the faster the absorption speed.

Magic.Name: QYLT
Magic.Desc: Release the aura from the buildings, plants, and minerals in the scene. The more target auras, the higher the upper limit of your own aura, and the faster the absorption speed.

Magic.Name: SNZZ
Magic.Desc: Regenerate a limb,Recast everything he lost. Decrease ten days of condemnation per use and consume fifty years of life

Magic.Name: ZT_QXHX
Magic.Desc: Capture a soul without cultivation as a living creature, refine it to increase your cultivation, and gain insight at the same time. The higher the target perception, the stronger the effect. .

Magic.Name: HYAbsorbGong_6
Magic.Desc: Apply a spell to a similar species, parasitize a ray of the gods on it, and transform the base value of the parasitic object into its own equivalent cultivation and enlightenment at 0 o'clock every day.\nFor each unit that parasitizes, it will damage the mind by distracting the soul, and the target will be weakened by being parasitized. Release the target once it has been released, and you can take back the magic power.

Magic.Name: WGCC
Magic.Desc: The pure vitality aura stimulates all the vitality of the plant, which can greatly increase its growth rate in a day. The higher the target plant grade, the worse the effect.

Magic.Name: TSTL_W
Magic.Desc: A secret technique using Xianyuan recorded in Yuantianshu consumes Xianyuan to integrate with the practitioner to increase the shield value and shield strength of the practitioner. (Decrease the caster's corresponding attributes)

Magic.Name: TSTL_J
Magic.Desc: A secret technique using Xianyuan recorded in Yuantianshu consumes Xianyuan to integrate into the practitioner to increase the spiritual rebirth and magic power of the practitioner. (Decrease the caster's corresponding attributes)

Magic.Name: TSTL_S
Magic.Desc: A secret technique using Xianyuan recorded in Yuantianshu, which consumes Xianyuan to integrate into the practitioner to improve the individual's spiritual return and cultivation (reducing the corresponding attributes of the practitioner).

Magic.Name: TSTL_M
Magic.Desc: A secret technique using Xianyuan recorded in Yuantianshu consumes Xianyuan to integrate into the practitioner to increase the practitioner's life and magic power limit. (Decrease the caster's corresponding attributes)

Magic.Name: TSTL_H
Magic.Desc: A secret technique using Xianyuan recorded in Yuantianshu consumes Xianyuan to integrate into the practitioner to increase its power and reduce its consumption. (Decrease the caster's corresponding attributes)

Magic.Name: TSTL_T
Magic.Desc: A secret technique using Xianyuan recorded in Yuantianshu consumes Xianyuan into the body of the practitioner to increase the practitioner's furnace ceiling and Jindan value. (Decrease the caster's corresponding attributes)

Magic.Name: TYS_LY
Magic.Desc: Consumption of 10,000 spirit power and a source stone, a source of five hundred years of life will make a source, and the caster will increase a large amount of condemnation.

Magic.Name: YTS_LSY
Magic.Desc: Consumption of 100,000 auras and a source stone, the maximum limit of one thousand and five years of life to make a god source, while increasing the amount of condemnation of the caster.

Magic.Name: YTS_LXY
Magic.Desc: Consumes tens of millions of spiritual power and a source stone. The maximum life span is 3,000 yuan to make an immortal source, and at the same time increases the amount of condemnation of the caster.
